A marketplace is a place where everyone can post their offerings.
Create your own virtual shop in which you can publish your offerings and promotions.
Please choose a link for your public shop, so that people can find it in search and share with others.\n\nIf you\'re not interested, we suggest creating a private shop instead.
You can provide an optional description for your shop.
Public shops can be found in search, anyone can subscribe to them.
Private shops can only be joined via an invite link.
People can join your shop by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.

If you set a permanent link, other people will be able to find and join your shop.

You can use a-z, 0-9 and underscores.
Minimum length is 5 characters.
